casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Scott David ALLEN. No. 115A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 18, 2005. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Scott David Allen. *237Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of July 2005 by Attorney General to File Supplemental Argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of July 2005."
